Others: Golden State Warriors defeated the OKC Thunder on Sunday night in an impressive bounce-back victory.
The Warriors are now tied atop the Western Conference with an 8-2 record.
Steph Curry made an Instagram post after the game, adding Luke Combs' 'Ain't No Love In Oklahoma' and captioning it, 'Solid Trip. Now- Back to the crib!'
Curry's song choice was a subtle shot at the Thunder, and fans reacted to it in the comments.
Curry hit a dagger three against OKC in Sunday's win, pulling out his 'Night Night' celebration afterwards.
Curry has several iconic moments in Oklahoma City, as the superstar point guard seems to always come up big against the Thunder.
